item.title: Telegram Image Resize Bot
item.description: Some time ago, I’ve had a project where I needed to have sets of images in different sizes. That was the only work with images in this project, and I did not want to bother with a complex image editor setup. So, I’ve decided to create a simple telegram bot for quick image resize. Telegram: https://t.me/resizerbot. Github: https://github.com/smyachenkov/resizer_bot. How it works First, you need to send an image. Both files and compressed images are supported.
